text: Curfew Breakers is a 1957 American film starring Paul Kelly and Cathy Downs. It was also known as Hooked and Narcotics Squad. ==External links== * *Curfew Breakers at Letterbox DVD *Curefew Breakers at TCMDB Category:1957 films Category:American films Category:American action films Category:English- language films Category:Films scored by Paul Dunlap
title: Curfew Breakers
